briefTitle: Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of a 20-Valent Pneumococcal Vaccine in Adults 65 Years of Age or Older With Prior Pneumococcal Vaccination
officialTitle: A PHASE 3, RANDOMIZED, OPEN-LABEL TRIAL TO EVALUATE THE SAFETY AND IMMUNOGENICITY OF A 20-VALENT PNEUMOCOCCAL CONJUGATE VACCINE IN ADULTS â‰¥65 YEARS OF AGE WITH PRIOR PNEUMOCOCCAL VACCINATION
summary: This Phase 3 will describe the safety and immunogenicity of a 20-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine formulation in adults 65 years of age or older with prior pneumococcal vaccination

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Local Reactions Within 10 Days After Vaccination
